name: Escape Meat Prison
description:
Escape Meat Prison is the first level of a game that is a glimpse inside the mind of someone dealing with  inattentive and distractible ADHD.  The player is given the simple task of taking out the garbage, a mundane task to many. You must hold onto your thought, while avoiding all of the distractions in your mind. 

THE GAME IS MEANT TO BE TOUGH

Controls / Directions 

-Click and hold left click on the main thought, dragging it around the screen to avoid the distractions. 

-You must survive  a minute in the mind, to successfully perform the task. (An audio queue will play to show completion of the level.  

-If you fail, no more objects will spawn and you must hard reset game.

Game is still a work in progress.
